attributes.action: EU Referendum - Leave the Leave Result Alone
attributes.additional_details:
The EU Referendum was a clear question of Remain or Leave  (without any published conditions of turnout percentage).
In true democratic procedure the majority of voters chose for the UK to Leave the EU.
We the undersigned expect our freely voted Government to carry out the wishes of its electorate and take the UK out of the EU at the earliest feasible date.
attributes.background: We call on HM Government to complete the democratic process & implement the wishes of the UK's voting majority, enabling the UK to Leave the EU.
